ModMetaData.name: RimTraits - Medieval Talents
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v2.0.4[/h1]
[h1]Get [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] to change your Vanilla Trait Colors to match this mod![/h1]
This Medieval trait mod adds 35 traits defining a pawn's talent, they are mutually exclusive to each other with increasing rarity for the higher tier traits.
This mod operates on the premise that skills don't equate to talent, and talent doesn’t necessarily translate to passion.
You could really love doing something but you could still suck at it. And likewise, you can have talent with something but you’re not necessarily passionate about them. These traits also give additional Temperature, Mood, Mental Break and Pain Tolerance buff to compensate for the lack of technology during medieval times, and to represent people's ability to face hardships during less civilized ages.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]35 Traits (Guaranteed spawn - 1 per pawn) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508292711][KV] More Trait Slots - 1.2[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508850027]RimHUD[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1855885448]Guard For Me[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*][Minor Conflict] May conflict with mods that changes trait colour based on commonality. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance feedbacks are appreciated, please do however bear in mind that this mod is balanced around larger colonies (35-80 colonists) that are limited to Medieval-level technologies.
